elements.title: Interactive World
elements.description: Create interactive snow,mud,water and foliage area in large world.
elements.technicalDetails:
World Drawing Board

  • Snow trails
  • Water waves simulation
  • Foliage(grass) interact
  • Foot steps on mud
  • Designate areas with physics volume(World Interact Volume)
  • Large world support(World Drawing Board will follow player pawn, and only simulate area around player)
  • Auto active and shut off simulating if no brushes draw on


Brush

  • Wheel trail brush
  • Multi-Draw mode: Draw trail according to moving distance. Allow high-speed moving objects to leave continuous trails
  • Auto culling brushes faraway, outside the drawing board, outside the interact volume


Features of Snow Simulation

  • Self-Shadow
  • Keep trails from afar with lower resolution
  • Fluffy freshly piled snow


Code Modules:

  • InteractiveWorld (Runtime)


Number of Blueprints:12

Number of C++ Classes:5

Network Replicated: (No)

Supported Development Platforms: (Win64)

Supported Target Build Platforms: (Win64)

Documentation: Documentation

Example Project: Example Project
elements.longDescription:
Easily create interactive snow, mud, water and foliage area in large world.

Playable Demo


Documentation


Google drive:

Documentation (English)

Documentation (Chinese简体中文)


腾讯文档Tencent Docs

(For those who can't open Google)

Documentation


GitHub Source Code

If you want to get update immediately, you can get update as soon as we develop.

If you find any bug or have some issues, you can add issues or pull requests to me.


This is my space 聆枫LingFeng的个人空间_哔哩哔哩_bilibili



Update Log


2023.03.22 Version 1.3 Fluid&Wind


  • Fluid Drawing Board updated. You can use it as wind field to drive particles and foliage. And make interactive fog.
  • Merged Material Parameter Collections, all Drawing Boards share one Material Parameter Collection, so that it will be easier to merge several affects into one material.
  • Update Editor Utility Widget. It will be easier to use.
  • Optimize Turbulent Brush, it will have a better falloff when moving away from surface.
  • Bug Fix: Fixed an mistake in snow self-shadow, now you’ll get better self-shadow in snow.


2023.02.28 Version 1.2


  • Support Sequencer and better support swimming!
  • Add more Drawing Board Follow Mode, allow you follow target actor or simulate on where Drawing Board is.
  • Add Interact Mode to Interact Brush
  • Added Debug Tool to help you debug Interact Brush and Drawing Board.
  • Manual Interact Brush Enter/Leave functions to Interact Volume.For these Interact Brushes which are not attached to Primitive Component.
  • Allow set Data Asset in“EUW_DrawingBoardSettings”Data Asset And refresh Interact Volume.
  • Bug Fix: Fix wheel draw incorrectly when rotation > 180
  • Bug Fix: Some Interact Brushes can’t be added to interact when attaching to component which does not simulate physics.

2023.02.13 Version 1.1


  • Support Low Quality snow simulation.
  • Adding custom following Actor to support using with sequencer.
  • Allow you to edit fresh snow fall time in Drawing Board settings.
  • Fixed a BUG that wheel pattern mirror-flipped when moving backward.

elements.title: Runtime Vertex Painter
elements.description: Function library that helps you paint Static/SkeletalMeshComponent vertex color in runtime
elements.technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Paint vertex color in runtime
  • Paint in single LOD or all LODs
  • You can select paint channel R/G/B/A/RGBA
  • Paint in a box range or sphere range
  • Falloff curve
  • Paint Opacity
  • This plugin does not modify the mesh's vertex color in a way that may be exported,but you can save vertices color in save game.

Code Modules:

  • RuntimeVertexPainterBPLibrary(Runtime)

Number of Blueprints:3

Number of C++ Classes:1

Network Replicated: (Yes)

Supported Development Platforms: (Windows)

Supported Target Build Platforms: (Windows)

Documentation: DOCUMENTATION
elements.longDescription:
Vertex color is color information attached to each vertex of mesh,it can be used to blend material layers to make some wonderful effects.

This plugin is designed for painting vertex color in runtime.

Both StaticMeshComponent and SkeletalMeshComponent can be painted


16 Blueprint nodes included,8 for static mesh and 8 for skeletal mesh

To view all functions and functions included,please go to

DOCUMENTATION


And here is a DEMO for you


Update 1.1 :Network replicated version update

New Component:BP_VertexPainterComponent to help you paint vertex color network replicated

New examples:Bomb explosion and sword wounds.

elements.title: FOV Based Projector
elements.description: Projector with Tyndall effect,also can be used as visual field visualizer
elements.technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Tyndall effect
  • Can be used as visual field visualizer
  • Projector with shadow
  • Visual range debug frame
  • Light mask
  • Aberration Correction:Pattern bias and scale,projector rotation to project pattern with bias

Supported Development Platforms:Windows

elements.title: Infinity Mirror FX
elements.description: Infinity mirror rendered by parallax Niagara system
elements.technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • Render a series of planes in 1 cm thickness by parallax.So you can put it on the ground or your wall.
  • Translucent or masked material is optional.
  • Highly customized system.

Type of Emitters: CPU, GPU

Number of Unique Effects:10

LODs: (No)

Number of Materials:10

Number of Textures:16

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
elements.longDescription:
Infinity mirror rendered by parallax Niagara system.

VIDEO


Content:


Infinity Mirror Templete

A templete which allows you customize pattern,color curve layers and materials and so on.You can use it to make beautiful infinity mirror effects.


9 Useful systems based on infinity mirror

1 Painting Mirror: Paint something on a mirror;

2-5 Infinity Portal Effects:Particles fall into portal,which uses parallax projection to make effects of infinity extension portals;

6-7 Mesh Sampler:Sample Static\Skeletal mesh and create particles in portal with parallax;

8-9 Particle Infinity Mirror:Simply use particles with parallax to render layers.

elements.title: Parallax LED Pack
elements.technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Pure mathematical calculation to make parallax
  • Customize LED color or use pattern color
  • Fade by distance to avoid more and shake when camera is far away
  • Customize LED beads tiling density and beads will automatically avoid edge(defined by a mask)
  • Auto size rectangle LED blueprint
  • LED text render board

Number of Unique Materials and Material Instances:6

Number of Textures: 3 LED bead mask,6 shape range mask

Texture Resolutions: 512 and 128

Supported Development Platforms:Windows,Mac

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Additional Notes:Pure mathematical calculation to make parallax effect. so there is no textures for parallax,and normal is also made with mathematical calculation.
elements.longDescription:
6 parallax LED materials

Pure mathematical calculation to make parallax effect and normal.

Beautiful but lower expense (better than materials without parallax,cost is lower than mesh or POM)

Video﻿

elements.title: SplineSweepMesh
elements.description: Use two spline to create a mesh
elements.technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Procedural mesh
  • Sweep spline along another spline to create mesh
  • Smoothed normal or not
  • Side UVs created

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type

  • SplineSweepMesh [Runtime]

Number of Blueprints:2

Number of C++ Classes:2

Network Replicated: (No)

Supported Development Platforms: (win 64)

Supported Target Build Platforms: (win 64)

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/14VSYfDIL48kEqiLUkkqpnwEAjW062BZBvH70m6oPkDQ/edit?usp=sharing

Example Project: Maps/L_ShowRoom
elements.longDescription:
Documentation

Use two spline to create a procedural mesh. You can rotate and scale spline points to make more complex meshes.

You can create grow up animations with function easily.

elements.title: Master Map and Mark System
elements.description: Powerful map and mark system.Multiplayer support.
elements.technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Use texture or material to create mark brush
  • Use static map or capture in game
  • War fog
  • With some useful mark materials
  • Net work replicated
  • Player can add mark
  • Support different map for different area

Number of Blueprints:5

Number of UI:4

Input: (Keyboard, Mouse)

Network Replicated: (Yes)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Others: Not tested

Documentation:

Documentation EN

Documentation CN
elements.longDescription:
| Playable DEMO:

Google

Baidu

__________________________________________________


| Video：

YouTube

Bilibili

_________________________________________________


| Documentation:

Documentation EN

Documentation CN

__________________________________________________


| Email:

2523366376@qq.com

_____________________________________________________________________________


Mark

  • Use texture or material to create UI Brush.You can use dynamic material to create dynamic mark .
  • BurtonMark.In big map,once your mouse stays on the ButtonMark,you can see the datils and distance.
  • Player VirtualMark.Players can add their mark on big map.these marks will be shared in multiplayer game,and a VirtualMark actor will be paced in the scenes.
  • Visual Distance.If you want,mark can only be seen when player is close enough.
  • Text.You can add some text on mark UI.
  • In multiplayer game,mark visibility can be shared with group numbers.

_____________________________________________________________________________


Map

  • Sphere or Square little map.And mark out of little map's range will be held on the edged (you can disable it in specific mark).
  • War Fog.Multiplayer support.Use fog noise or texture to blend fog.
  • Little map can scale with speed.
  • Big map can be scaled and dragged with mouse.
  • Use static map or capture in game(If your science is created dynamically,it will be useful).Big map will be divided into pieces of tiles and capture will only be made when you go to a different area.
  • You can use different maps in different area.For example,when you go into a building,map can change to a indoor map.

_____________________________________________________________________________

elements.title: Cross Sectional Area
elements.description: Calculate area and draw cross-sector on to RT
elements.technicalDetails:
Features：

  • PURE BLUEPRINT
  • Work with static mesh
  • For now,can't work with skeletal mesh
  • Known BUG:If two or more sections of a static mesh overlap with each other,cross-section area can't be calculated and drawn correctly

Number of Blueprints: 1

Input: (Keyboard)

Network Replicated: (No)

Supported Development Platforms:windows 10

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
elements.longDescription:
VIDEO

Calculate area and draw cross-sector on to RT by slicing procedural mesh and traverse triangles on the cross-sector,calculate area of each triangles and accumulation them,so the accuracy is depend on the accuracy of mesh.

Work with static mesh

UPDATE 1.1 Debug Triangles in cross sectional area

elements.title: 3DPieChart
elements.description: 3D pie chart made with procedure mesh component
elements.technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • Pure Blueprint
  • Fan-shape or ring sector
  • Vertex normal is created correctly
  • Number of vertex can be defined by angle per triangle
  • No UVs

Number of Blueprints:4

Number of Materials:1
elements.longDescription:
My Email：2523355376@qq.com


Quickly define a pie with a float array，the blueprint will use procedure mesh component to create a 3d pie.


You can update the pie in runtime


Use timeline to lerp values and update pie to make animation.


Define colors with a color array.
